name: Fool's Gold (PandaKing)
description:
This is a game made for a game jam for GameDev and is also my second to be submitted to a game jam. The game's assets were all made by me. Please do not use them for your commercial projects. The source folder contains the entire Unity folder for Fool's Gold. (Trying to make a remote git for it was annoying me a lot so I thought this would be an alternative. It may have driven me a little crazy.)

What do you get when you live near some dig sites? You get a place with a lot of Gold! (and other treasures) So what are you waiting for? Get your pick and get out there!
